narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Quinton Residential Living is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Indianapolis, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $39.9M in Medicaid payments across 19K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $39.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
